attributes.action: Open borders for mothers with children from Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Open Borders for Mother’s with children .Let them in to this country .
attributes.background: I would like Government to let mothers with children’s come to UK without visa.They are running away from war .

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Commit to providing refuge for at least 100,000 Ukrainian women & children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609565

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431
